document_data.name: ''Insanity's Kiss''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Insanity's Kiss''''' was a unique [[potion]] formulated by the [[hag]] named [[Auntie Ethel]], originating from her laboratory beneath the [[Gnarled Teahouse]] of the [[Putrid Bog]].
document_data.Description: The potion was kept in an earthenware jug, plugged by a stopper adorned with a single feather. When holding the jug, it appeared as if there was some enraged creature trapped within.
document_data.Powers: Whoever drank from ''Insanity's Kiss'' was thrown into a murderous frenzy and became immediately hostile towards anyone around them.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, there was only one known bottle of ''Insanity's Kiss'' in existence.
